abstract: Supreme Court agrees to decide whether Congress can make it crime to lie about having earned military decoration; case involves Xavier Alvarez, who says his conviction violates First Amendment.
snippet: A man raises First Amendment issues over his conviction for lying about having won military honors.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: A man raises First Amendment issues over his conviction for lying about having won military honors.

headline.main: Justices Take Case on Lying About Honors From Military
headline.print_headline: Justices Take Case on Lying About Honors From Military
